name: Dock The Boat (Vectors)
description:
A short, casual educational game to learn about how vectors work. Wind and water stream oppose the movement of your boat. Set the heading of the boat such that you just, slowly reach the treasure island.

The game takes you through carefully constructed levels/challenges to give more intuition about vectors magnitude and direction. 

To understand vectors better, try a short, free game based course on our website.

Controls

  • Click using mouse to set heading for the boat. Watch how it plays out.
  • You can set direction on mobile using tap. (But the cursor/cross hair) does not work on mobile
